scripts.example:counter: ts-node examples/counter/pre.ts && concurrently "nodemon --ext ts,ui --ignore **/dist --exec ts-node examples/counter/pre.ts" "parcel examples/counter/src/counter.html"
scripts.example:todolist: ts-node examples/todolist/pre.ts && concurrently "nodemon --ext ts,ui --ignore **/dist --exec ts-node examples/todolist/pre.ts" "parcel examples/todolist/src/todolist.html"
